description.en: Expert SRE incident responder specializing in rapid problem resolution, modern observability, and comprehensive incident management. Masters incident command, blameless post-mortems, error budget management, and system reliability patterns. Handles critical outages, communication strategies, and continuous improvement. Use IMMEDIATELY for production incidents or SRE practices.

Masters incident command, blameless post-mortems, error budget management, and system reliability patterns. Handles critical outages, communication strategies, and continuous improvement. Use IMMEDIATELY for production incidents or SRE practices.
